Hey guys,

Sorry just jumping in here

We haven't sent the updated ceiling specs and requested any changes to the ceiling pages yet, so let's just hold on this for now and I'll get those changes across this week.

Can you triple check all the specs and updated graphs have been updated correctly as I've also just noticed Fracture panel is displaying old graph and spec sheets. Fracture tiles are displaying old graph and spec sheets as well… and 1912 appears to have no graph at all.

We're having some frustrations as we're checking work and more frequently finding things haven't been updated properly. I know this was a large task, which is why I tried to communicate this as simply as possible through auditing each individual page and providing direct links to the downloads that required updating. Would it be easier for us to communicate these large changes over a call, going forward? Otherwise, is there another problem we need to address?

On the Full Colour page I can understand why you're having problems displaying the graph, as it only relates to the 12mm results, yet we list a number of thicknesses. Let me chat with Karina and come back with a decision on this. We shouldn't have this problem on any of our other product pages so can we have the correct graphs, technical info and specs fixed on these please?

Thanks

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager



T +61 1800 626 462 • M +61 414 167 790

Hey Heath,

It doesn't seem like the spec sheets have been updated?

For example on our full colour panel page none of the spec sheets have been updated as per our instructions -

https://acoufelt.com/au/product/colourways/



Full color

SPEC SHEET: Needs replacing, use:

FILASORB7: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/t7903v1san9zhcc/AAA0ee3D8zPpdskNGrZhD6vca/7mm%20Full%20Color%20Spec%20Sheet_FA.pdf?dl=0
